Gift to Kim Jong Il 
    Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a gift from the secretary general of the United Left Movement of Dominica.
 It was conveyed to an official concerned by Secretary General Miguel Mejia on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.content:
Floral Basket from Palestinian President 
    Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- Palestinian President Yasser Arafat sent a floral basket to the statue of President Kim Il Sung standing on Mansu Hill on the occasion of the tenth anniversary of his demise.
 The floral basket was laid before the statue on July 7 by Palestinian Ambassador to the DPRK Shaher Mohammed Abdlah.    
 Written on the ribbon were words "Your Excellency the Great Leader Kim Il Sung Will Live Forever".

articles.content:
Indian Ambassador Presents Credentials to Kim Yong Nam
    Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from N. T. Khankhup, Indian ambassador e. p. to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
 On hand were Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kim Yong Il and a staff member of the Indian embassy.    
 After receiving the credentials the president had a talk with the ambassador.

articles.content:
Military Attaches Corps Visits International Friendship Exhibition
    Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here visited the International Friendship Exhibition Tuesday on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of the demise of President Kim Il Sung.
 The guests looked round with deep emotion gifts Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il received from heads of political parties and states, political and public figures and people from all walks of life in different countries.    
 They made entries in the visitor's books.
